confirmLogoutContent: Are you sure you want to log out?
aboutDescription: Founded in May 2025, Job Hunter is a forward-thinking tech company on a mission to redefine how job seekers and employers connect. Whether you're hunting for your dream job or searching for the perfect candidate, Job Hunter makes the process faster, smarter, and simpler.
missionDescription: To bridge the gap between talent and opportunity through technology, ensuring everyone has access to fulfilling careers and the tools to reach them.
visionDescription: We envision a world where employment is fair, transparent, and accessible to all — regardless of location or background.
innovationText: Always evolving to meet the future of work.
enterJobTitle: Enter a job title or keyword below and click Search to explore opportunities.
trustedCompaniesDesc: Work with top companies you can rely on.
diversePositionsDesc: Find roles across all industries and skills.
fastApplicationDesc: Apply quickly with our user-friendly platform.
name: Name
